original: ratna tri sva sti g'a th'a /

original: dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
translated: The Verses of Auspiciousness of the Three Jewels

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: che ba'i che mchog ston mchog bla na med //
analyzed: che ba'i che mchog ston mchog bla na med //
translated: The supreme greatness, the supreme teacher, the unsurpassed,

original: chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis //
translated: By the blessing of the sun-like conqueror, the lord of Dharma,

original: bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste //
analyzed: bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste //
translated: May the harm of the mƒÅras and the classes of obstructors be pacified,üîΩAnd may there always be auspiciousness day and night.

original: rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog / chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med //
analyzed: rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog / chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med //
translated: The supreme Dharma of the truth of dharmatƒÅ, the unsurpassed,

original: dam chos bdud rtsi'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: dam chos bdud rtsi'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
translated: By the blessing of the truth of the nectar of the holy Dharma,

original: nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs rnams 'phel ba //
analyzed: nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs rnams 'phel ba //
translated: May the accumulation of virtue increase, free from the faults of error,üîΩAnd may there always be auspiciousness day and night.

original: rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog / dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba //
analyzed: rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog / dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba //

original: rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
translated: By the blessing of the truth of the benefit-bestowing heirs of the victors,

original: nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste //
analyzed: nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste //
translated: May the harm of the enemy of the torment of afflictive suffering be pacified,üîΩAnd may there always be auspiciousness day and night.

original: rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog / tshangs dang lha dbang srung ma'i byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog / tshangs dang lha dbang srung ma'i byin rlabs kyis //

original: phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te //
analyzed: phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te //
translated: May there be the auspiciousness of the helpful gods,üîΩAnd may all be auspicious for accomplishing the desired wishes,üîΩFor long life, good health, and happiness.

original: bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang // tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan par shog / dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la gsungs pa rdzogs so /
